lu_part1: Den Apel fält net wäit vum Bam,
lu_part2: e misst just de Bierg erofrullen.
en_literal_translation_p1: The apple doesn’t fall far from the tree,
en_literal_translation_p2: it just has to roll down the mountain.
en_closest_real_corresponding_saying_p1: The apple doesn’t fall far from the tree,
en_closest_real_corresponding_saying_p2: but sometimes it takes a detour.
